description: Unified rendering pipeline configuration for SDF-first, polygon, and hybrid rendering
_renderModeDescription: sdf_first: SDF raymarch then polygons | polygon_first: Polygons then SDF | hybrid: Both simultaneously | auto: Dynamically choose
_useRTXDescription: Enable hardware raytracing (RTX). Falls back to compute if unavailable
_fallbackToComputeDescription: Use compute shaders for raymarching if RTX unavailable

sdfRasterizer._tileSizeDescription: Tile size for tile-based culling (8, 16, or 32)
sdfRasterizer._rayEpsilonDescription: Ray hit threshold for SDF surface detection
sdfRasterizer._enableShadowsDescription: Enable shadow rays during SDF raymarching
sdfRasterizer._aoSamplesDescription: Number of AO samples per pixel (2-8)

hybridSettings._renderOrderDescription: Order of rendering passes in hybrid mode
hybridSettings._depthBiasDescription: Depth bias to prevent Z-fighting between SDF and polygons
hybridSettings._autoOrderThresholdDescription: SDF percentage threshold for auto render order selection (0.0-1.0)

performance._occlusionCullingDescription: CPU occlusion culling (expensive, usually not worth it)
performance._enableLODDescription: Enable level-of-detail system for polygon meshes
performance._tileCullingDescription: Enable tile-based frustum culling for SDF objects
performance._maxSDFObjectsPerTileDescription: Maximum SDF objects to test per tile

quality._presetDescription: Quality preset that overrides individual settings

debug._showTilesDescription: Visualize tile boundaries and active tiles
debug._colorByRenderModeDescription: Tint SDFs and polygons different colors for debugging
